Ndipo nkosatheka kwa Allah kukudziwitsani zinthu zamseri, koma Allah amasankha mwa atumiki ake amene wamfuna (nkumdziwitsa zina mwa zimenezo). Choncho khulupirirani Allah ndi atumiki ake. Ndipo ngati mukhulupirira ndi kuopa (Allah), pa inu padzakhala malipiro aakulu
